title: S12 Ep234: Strange Encounters Of The Big Muddy Monster
itunes:title: Strange Encounters Of The Big Muddy Monster
description:
Today BEYOND the DARKNESS gets down & dirty with Strange Encounters of The Big Muddy Monster with investigator Chad Lewis.

For over 100 years people have been encountering something strange near the Big Muddy River. Described as a giant beast covered in mud, the Big Muddy Monster remains one of the strangest cases out there.

https://www.chadlewisresearch.com/

Get his books here: www.Amazon.com/shop/darknessradio

www.Harrys.com/darkness

www.TrueCar.com
